short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the BitClout UI, in small ways. Adds dark mode to match system preferences. Requires zero permissions, only modifies CSS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the BitClout interface, in small ways. Adds dark mode to match your system preferences. Requires zero permissions, only modifies CSS.
